programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: The Grey Men
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ah Shan goes undercover in prison to gain the trust of criminal Tian, in order to seek evidence against his gang. After their release from jail, Shan helps Tian rise within the gang and become the new boss. However, just as Shan successfully cracks down on the gang, he uncovers a shocking secret about Tian...

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Clouds successor as the citys guard.

programme.title: Stand Up Story
programme.desc: Mancer knows his father Wah is intellectually challenged since young and has to take care of him after his mother left them. When Mancer discovers and finds solace in stand-up comedy, he learns that hardships provide the best comedic material - from his own school ridicule experience to pandemic woes, misery can fuel laughter!

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: The Brotherhood of Rebel
programme.desc: Chai, a triad member, helps his childhood friend Meow flee Hong Kong after discovering that Meow attempted to kill his triad boss. 17 years later, Chai becomes a key member of the triad. When he runs into Meow one day, he knows that his gang will kill Meow if they find him. Caught between triad and brotherhood, what will Chai choose?

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicates mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other's parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents' first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: Love Punch
programme.desc: Talented boxer Jia Yang is caught in an underground fight to clear her father's debts. She loses her Olympic aspiration and vanishes from the boxing world. 10 years later, Coach Li Yue is determined to help her honour her father's wish by returning to the ring. As passion and obligation collide, can Jia Yang revive her abandoned boxing dream?

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2009
programme.desc: Successful businesswoman Yu Chu has no chance of finding a husband with her insufferable personality, much to the consternation of her younger brother Yu Bo, who due to a curse, will fail in love until his sister gets married. Yu Bo hires a love expert, Dick, to woo his sister. Smitten at first sight, Yu Chu is not about to let Dick get away...

programme.title: The Unwavering Brotherhood
programme.desc: The revered elder of a triad gang faces succession uncertainty when his three trusted underlingsHua, Fei, and Guoare robbed while transporting gang money. Determined to redeem himself, Hua vows to track down the robbers. However, when Hua discovers that Fei and Guo are connected to the robbery, he must choose between loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: The Ex-Files 4: Marriage Plan
programme.desc: Two brothers, Meng Yun and Yu Fei, are of marriageable age and are facing challenges in love. Yun dodges family pressure to marry after his breakup, while Fei and his girlfriend opt for a marriage cooling-off period to tackle marriage issues.

programme.title: From Beijing With Love
programme.desc: Stephen Chow writes, directs & stars in this hilarious James Bond spoof that sees the Chinese government assign their worst secret agent (Chow) to recover a stolen dinosaur skull.

programme.title: As It Burns
programme.desc: Detective Wei investigates the death of Yan Zhen in an explosion which seems more than an accident to him. Wei then finds out that Yan Zhen looks a lot like Yin, the girlfriend of Yan Zhens childhood friend Lu, and uncovers a tangled web of deceit leading to surprising revelations when he merges details from the past and the present.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Amid the recession caused by the pandemic, debt-ridden wedding planner, Sheng, finds a lifeline as he transitions into a funeral planner. His unconventional approach leads to unexpected success, and his attitude toward his career and life is transformed after being inspired by the respected Master Wen.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: Love Lies
programme.desc: Gynaecologist Veronica downloads a dating app for fun. Little does she know that the charming French engineer on the other end is actually a local con artist named Joe, who is a member of an online scam group. As their fake relationship unfolds, both Joes guilty conscience and Veronicas hopes intensify.

programme.title: Cruel War
programme.desc: To combat the greenhouse effect, scientist Yan Xin attempts to plant newly developed super rubber seeds on a remote island, hoping to transform it into a thriving new land. Yan Xin's ex-husband decides to accompany her on this perilous journey. As conflicts arise, they encounter the local drug cartel, and a fatal battle is about to begin.

programme.title: Last Suspect
programme.desc: Lawyer Chen receives a mysterious call demanding her to defend a murder suspect after her daughter is kidnapped, and is told that she can only save her daughter by winning the case. As she starts investigation with the police and evidence emerges, Chen discovers the truth and reveals the mastermind. Can she rescue her daughter in time?

programme.title: Ha Ha Ha Happy New Year!!
programme.desc: Business tycoon Duan is kidnapped and seriously injured by the "Shadow Empire", accidentally losing his memory. Duan is looked after by Su, a temple owner, and as he slowly recovers, Duan discovers that he has been replaced by a doppelgnger, prompting him to uncover a shocking hidden secret.

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: Tristar
programme.desc: Young priest Hong disguises himself to protect Bai, a prostitute, while Detective Liu investigates her ties to a prostitution ring. Hong finds Bai a lawful job and helps her negotiate with the underworld. Meanwhile, Liu's investigation causes misunderstandings can he crack down on the gang? How will Hong manage his emotions as Bai falls for him?

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan, actor Cheung Chau Wan, gynecologist Fu Mo Sum, feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung, and dance coach Charlie Lam - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu, who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives.

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle

programme.title: Crypto Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigation officer Lok sets up a special team to investigate a corruption case involving a banks top executives use of cryptocurrency to manipulate the trading market. When the banks chairman is kidnapped and kidnappers demand ransom in crypto coins, Lok connects the dots and vows to hunt down the mastermind behind both crimes.

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jins pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wifes death.

programme.title: Ten Tigers Of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Vengeance Of A Snow Girl
programme.desc: A crippled woman seeks vengeance against the four men who killed her parents. However, when she crosses path with a young warrior who falls in love with her, trouble ensues as his father is one of the killers responsible for her family's massacre years ago.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Dong and Chu plan to get married but their families who are lifelong rivals, disapproved. They decide to fake suicide and eventually get both of their parents to settle their differences and approve the marriage. Concurrently, a record company announces that they will release Dong's songs, leading to double bliss for the couple.

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chan's family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chan's daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang's. On the Chang's farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaire's Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content, yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor's sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: When The Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: Oath Of Death
programme.desc: Three Sung loyalists become blood brothers to fight the tyranny of the Tartar invaders. To oust the oppressors altogether, Ma releases the kidnapped Tartar princess in a strategic effort to gain points with the invaders, but it soon becomes apparent that he desires both a great position and power, and will do anything to get it

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent's consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: This is adapted from Louis Cha's The Book and the Sword. A young swordsman is tasked to lead a patriotic secret society to fight the traitorous general who colludes with the enemy. At the same time, he encounters a female warrior and two beautiful princesses, and is caught between all their affections for him.

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: Finger Of Doom
programme.desc: The protagonists are ex-swordmasters who now find joy in making umbrellas. They track down the evil Madame Kung Sun and her poisonous Finger of Doom, a unique supernatural power which allows her to transform normal, everyday people into horrifying zombies, and this is just the start of their mythical adventure against this zombie maker!

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: Big Times For The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again

programme.title: Godfather Of Canton
programme.desc: A docker, Lin Si Hai, accidentally saves Commissioner Cheng who then offers him a position in the police force. Lin is smart and soon rises through the ranks through treachery and corruption, before becoming a gangster.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant's confusion, threatening the couple's union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Master Chen was an esteemed Monkey Kung Fu master, until he is framed and crippled by a ruthless villain and ends up becoming a wandering artiste. When Chen meets a young man, Little Monkey, on the streets, he decides to teach him all his monkey kung fu moves. Both men eventually team up to avenge Chen's past insult.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: Shaolin Prince
programme.desc: As the names of Chang Cheh and Liu Chia-liang became legendary, all-too-often the name of their equally valued collaborator, Tang Chia, is omitted. That may be, because, unlike the previous pair, the veteran kung-fu choreographer only went on to direct three movies of his own. Of course, that makes this trio all the more special, and this first effort perhaps the most special of all. It may be an eye-filling, mind-bending martial arts tale of two royal princes battling for the rightful recovery of the throne, but it's also a party, where Tang invites two cinematographers, three editors, and no less than five other choreographer friends to almost literally shoot the works. The results are kung-fu configurations not only never seen before, but never even imagined!

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.desc: Krishna Prabhu Deva, a city bachelor, wishes to get married to a modern, English speaking girl but ends up with village belle Devi Tamannaah. 2016

programme.title: Simmba
programme.desc: A corrupt police officer, works for Durva, an influential smuggler. However, his life takes an unusual turn when he decides to avenge a woman who was assaulted by Durva's brothers.

programme.desc: Conan is asked by the evil Queen Taramis to accompany a beautiful young princess in finding a magic treasure. If he returns with the treasure and the princess, the Queen promises to bring Conan's beloved Valeria back from the dead. But little does he know that she plans to kill both him and the princess, and that the return of the treasure will mean the extinction of mankind.

programme.title: Back To School
programme.desc: Millionaire Thornton Melon's (Rodney Dangerfield) son is a college misfit, so Thornton lends some fatherly support...by enrolling as a fellow freshman! Who cares if he never finished high school? Thornton's pockets are deep enough to buy his way in! But when he steals his professor's girlfriend (Sally Kellerman), Thornton goes just a little too far. Now, he'll have to hit the books, instead of his bank account - or go back to being the world's wealthiest dropout!

programme.title: Supermarket Sweep US S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Bring That Meat Back, Girl! - Now in its second season, join the fun as three teams battle it out in the studio supermarket, testing their grocery knowledge and speed to win big cash prizes in every episode.

programme.title: Family Feud S20 Ep15
programme.desc: Hosted by Daytime Emmy Award winning host Steve Harvey, Family Feud brings all new hilarious moments and families as they compete for a chance to win up to $20,000 by guessing the most popular answers to questions posed to 100 people surveyed.

programme.title: The Goldbergs S3 Ep8
programme.desc: In Conclusion, Thanksgiving - When Adam discovers his dads soft spot for the song Cats in the Cradle, Beverly exploits it to get Murray to invite his grouchy dad to Thanksgiving dinner.

programme.title: Alert: Missing Persons Unit S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Maya - The MPU searches for a missing homeless kid and stumbles upon a child trafficking ring.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jake - When Tess (Dolly Lewis) inserts herself into Jake's (Daniel Gillies) investigation to find the identity of a dead John Doe, she confronts conflicting emotions - fearing for her brother Lucas' (Alec Santos) life while driven to do the thing she loves most: solve the case. Tess continues to resist the traditional sight impaired training offered by her vision loss consultant Mia (Alice Christina-Corrigan), preferring to rely on Sunny's (Agam Darshi) remote guidance - until an unexpected crisis and a nudge from Matt (Jarod Joseph) forces her to reconsider. Meanwhile, Sunny is served divorce papers after failing to meet her husband for a date, leaving her concierge, Kye (Ennis Esmer), as her only real-life contact with the outside world.

programme.title: CSI: VEGAS S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The CSI team investigates the death of a local antique shop owner who died from an apparent gunshot wound that is missing one important clue - the bullet. Also, Max makes an important breakthrough in the ongoing case with Ocho from the robotics factory.

programme.title: BLUE BLOODS S14 Ep12
programme.desc: Without Fear or Favor - Danny joins forces with British investigator Christopher Granger (Jake Weber) to pursue a deadly international fugitive, and Erin faces pressure from her boss, D.A. Crawford (Roslyn Ruff), to secure an indictment against an officer. Also, Jamie investigates a sports gambling website accused of scamming its users, and Frank clashes with Mayor Chase (Dylan Walsh) when the mayor uses his authority to have a retired cop released from jail.

programme.title: BLACKLIST, THE S10 Ep10
programme.desc: The Postman - After an inmate opens fire at a high-security prison, the Task Force investigates a contraband smuggler known as The Postman. Cooper revisits his past ties to the suspect.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jake - When Tess (Dolly Lewis) inserts herself into Jake's (Daniel Gillies) investigation to find the identity of a dead John Doe, she confronts conflicting emotions - fearing for her brother Lucas' (Alec Santos) life while driven to do the thing she loves most: solve the case. Tess continues to resist the traditional sight impaired training offered by her vision loss consultant Mia (Alice Christina-Corrigan), preferring to rely on Sunny's (Agam Darshi) remote guidance - until an unexpected crisis and a nudge from Matt (Jarod Joseph) forces her to reconsider. programme.title: CORONER S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Crispr Sistr - Jenny and Donovan investigate the death of a lab assistant - but Jenny's personal interest in the lab risks clouding the case for her.

programme.title: BLUE BLOODS S14 Ep13
programme.desc: Bad to Worse - Frank intervenes when tensions rise between Mayor Chase (Dylan Walsh) and the fire commissioner of New York City (Mira Sorvino). Also, Erin is blindsided when Henry agrees to testify for the defense in a case she is prosecuting, Danny and Baez investigate when human remains are discovered in a storage unit, and Eddie and her partner Badillo navigate a complicated arrest when their criminal offender is scheduled to donate his kidney.

programme.title: CSI: VEGAS S3 Ep1
programme.desc: The Reaper - With their respected colleague Josh Folsom under arrest for the death of Kahn Schefter - the man responsible for killing Folsom's mother - the CSI team combs through every crumb of forensic evidence to determine his innocence or guilt.

programme.title: FBI S6 Ep8
programme.desc: Phantom - After an employee of the U.S. Army is shot in an industrial park, the team works to track down the killer who reveals a larger plot at play. Meanwhile, Tiffany continues to struggle with the guilt surrounding Hobbs' death.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mia - Jake (Daniel Gillies) encourages Tess (Dolly Lewis) to talk to Superintendent Bennett (Roger Cross) about getting her old job back, but her hopes are cut short by his disappointing offer to join the Metro PD only to ride a desk. Tess isn't about to be used as a PR token when the unsolved murder of a woman killed in her delivery van allows her to bring justice to an overlooked victim whilst proving her old boss wrong. Tess accepts a lesson in cane navigation from Mia (Alice Christina-Corrigan) but Sunny (Agam Darshi) is never far from her ear - except when she gets cut off ... just as Tess goes on a date with a potential killer.

programme.title: CSI: VEGAS S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Tunnel Vision - After an explosion in a bio lab, the CSI team races to determine which nerve agent left one of their own unconscious, while the others explore a dangerous underground tunnel to find another CSI who got kidnapped during the blast.

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Teammates - Lena and Danny are pulled into a high-stakes murder investigation when a whistleblower tied to one of Maes court cases is found dead. Meanwhile, Jonah and Sean prepare for their first official day on the job.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Under Fire - As a sniper begins targeting the L.A. Fire Department, a phone call from Street's (Alex Russell) mother drives a wedge between him and Molly (Laura James). Tan (David Lim) struggles with the T.L.I. Competition.

programme.title: BLUE BLOODS S14 Ep14
programme.desc: New York Minute - Danny and Baez scrutinize an art gallery suspected of selling counterfeit pieces after a detective investigating the establishment is murdered. Also, Eddie is conflicted when she discovers her former partner turned social worker, Rachel Witten (Lauren Patten), crossed the line to get a mentally ill client much needed help, and Frank is upset when an award Danny was to be honored with is rescinded by Grace Edwards (Lori Loughlin), the widow of an NYPD officer killed in the line of duty.

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Teammates - Lena and Danny are pulled into a high-stakes murder investigation when a whistleblower tied to one of Maes court cases is found dead. Meanwhile, Jonah and Sean prepare for their first official day on the job.

programme.title: FBI S6 Ep9
programme.desc: Best Laid Plans - When a retired FBI agent is tortured and killed while working a security job, Scola and Nina (FBI: MOST WANTED) go undercover as a married couple deep in the diamond game as the team tries to find out who is responsible. During the course of his and Nina's dangerous assignment, Scola is plagued by the possibility that their son Doug could end up parentless.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Matt - With Tess (Dolly Lewis) now back on duty with the Metro PD as a police consultant and Sunny (Agam Darshi) as her under the radar tech partner, a murder hits close to home for Tess and Sunny's first 'on the books' case when one of Matt's (Jarod Joseph) colleagues is found dead in the pool where Tess swims. As they investigate the mystery surrounding the swim coach's death and the dynamics of the Olympic-grade swim team, Tess and Sunny discover they were on opposite ends of the popularity scale in school. Mia (Alice Christina-Corrigan) offers her unexpected skills to the case and a shaken Matt sees a new side of Tess, leading to an unexpected moment between them. Meanwhile, Sunny is desperate for help with a DYI job that's gone awry and lets her concierge Kye (Ennis Esmer) into her apartment which reawakens her past fears.

programme.title: NCIS: HAWAI'I S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Run and Gun - After passing her medical and psych evaluations, Tennant is surprised to see Sam Hanna conducting her final interview to clear her return to work. Also, when the team discovers a breach in the U.S. Marshal's database, Sam joins Tennant in Las Vegas to locate the hacker.

programme.title: RAINMAKER, THE S1 Ep4
programme.desc: When Sarah reveals a detail about the case, Rudy must choose between his client and girlfriend.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S4 Ep8
programme.desc: Crusade - As Deacon (Jay Harrington) wrestles with a big decision about his daughter's future, S.W.A.T. chases a white supremacist group responsible for a series of hate crimes across the city.

programme.title: NCIS: HAWAI'I S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Run and Gun - After passing her medical and psych evaluations, Tennant is surprised to see Sam Hanna conducting her final interview to clear her return to work. Also, when the team discovers a breach in the U.S. Marshal's database, Sam joins Tennant in Las Vegas to locate the hacker.

programme.title: BLACKLIST, THE S10 Ep12
programme.desc: Dr. Michael Abani - Dembe reflects on his complicated past when he receives a concerning call from an old connection. An ambitious Congressman begins to question the Task Force's operations.

programme.title: BLUE BLOODS S14 Ep14
programme.desc: New York Minute - Danny and Baez scrutinize an art gallery suspected of selling counterfeit pieces after a detective investigating the establishment is murdered. Also, Eddie is conflicted when she discovers her former partner turned social worker, Rachel Witten (Lauren Patten), crossed the line to get a mentally ill client much needed help, and Frank is upset when an award Danny was to be honored with is rescinded by Grace Edwards (Lori Loughlin), the widow of an NYPD officer killed in the line of duty.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S4 Ep8
programme.desc: Crusade - As Deacon (Jay Harrington) wrestles with a big decision about his daughter's future, S.W.A.T. chases a white supremacist group responsible for a series of hate crimes across the city.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Matt - With Tess (Dolly Lewis) now back on duty with the Metro PD as a police consultant and Sunny (Agam Darshi) as her under the radar tech partner, a murder hits close to home for Tess and Sunny's first 'on the books' case when one of Matt's (Jarod Joseph) colleagues is found dead in the pool where Tess swims. As they investigate the mystery surrounding the swim coach's death and the dynamics of the Olympic-grade swim team, Tess and Sunny discover they were on opposite ends of the popularity scale in school. Mia (Alice Christina-Corrigan) offers her unexpected skills to the case and a shaken Matt sees a new side of Tess, leading to an unexpected moment between them. Meanwhile, Sunny is desperate for help with a DYI job that's gone awry and lets her concierge Kye (Ennis Esmer) into her apartment which reawakens her past fears.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S4 Ep8
programme.desc: Crusade - As Deacon (Jay Harrington) wrestles with a big decision about his daughter's future, S.W.A.T. chases a white supremacist group responsible for a series of hate crimes across the city.

programme.title: BLUE BLOODS S14 Ep15
programme.desc: No Good Deed - Danny and his nephew Joe Hill (Will Hochman) investigate the homicide of a delivery driver who may have been connected to an illegal narcotics ring in the city. Also, Eddie is determined to save the job of a probationary police officer who may be fired for responding to a crime, Frank faces a hard decision when he discovers Gormley is non-compliant with NYPD residency requirements, and Erin clashes with her boss, D.A. Crawford, when a seemingly rehabilated criminal from an old case becomes the subject of an armed robbery investigation.

programme.title: RAINMAKER, THE S1 Ep4
programme.desc: When Sarah reveals a detail about the case, Rudy must choose between his client and girlfriend.

programme.title: FBI S6 Ep10
programme.desc: Family Affair - After an FDIC security guard is killed while tending to a pregnant woman in distress, the team works to locate the woman and the killer who took her hostage. Meanwhile, OA and Isobel worry about Maggie as she navigates taking care of Ella.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Lucas - When Lucas (Alec Santos) comes to Tess' (Dolly Lewis) apartment in the middle of the night claiming he just needs a place to crash, Tess is quick to realize something is up. Tess unearths a bombshell when she visits a crime scene with Jake (Daniel Gillies) and finds disturbing clues that suggest Lucas may be implicated in the murder of a famous painter. Torn between her loyalty to the Homicide Division and the need to protect the only family she has left, Tess says nothing to Jake but instead uses Sunny (Agam Darshi) to watch over Lucas via a nanny cam while she gets to the bottom of the case. Meanwhile, Sunny invites Kye (Ennis Esmer) into her home to help with her DIY, but he stumbles onto a piece of her hidden past breaking her fragile trust.

programme.title: NCIS: HAWAI'I S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Crash and Burn - Following the crash of a prisoner transport plane, the NCIS team must find the convicts that escaped onto the island. Meanwhile, Sam Hanna and Tennant are tasked with locating a high-profile Russian prisoner known as "The Chemist".

programme.title: NCIS: ORIGINS S2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Edge - Season 2 of NCIS: Origins delves deeper into the unstoppable NCIS Camp Pendleton team led by the legendary Mike Franks, as well as Gibbs' early career as a special agent, and reveals the fate of Lala after last season's devastating car crash.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S4 Ep9
programme.desc: Next of Kin - Following the loss of a colleague, S.W.A.T. faces a potential reprimand from their superiors. Chris (Lina Esco) struggles with her grief as Hondo (Shemar Moore) focuses on breaking up the White Knights terrorist cell.

programme.title: Salem's Lot Ep04
programme.desc: Part 4 - As pandemonium grips Salem's Lot, Ben Mears convinces a few of the townsfolk of the grim reality that vampires have invaded the town, are breeding more, and must be stopped.

programme.title: Xena: Warrior Princess S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Athens City Academy Of The Performing Bards - Gabrielle auditions to attend the Athens City Academy to train as a bard -- but others trying for the few open spots include Homer and Euripides.

programme.title: North And South S1 Ep07
programme.desc: Episode 4 (Part 1) - Orry Main, a heir to a Southern plantation, and George Hazard, the son of a Pennsylvania industrialist. See how their friendship grows and discovery of the women they will love for the rest of their lives.

programme.title: Married... With Children S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Eatin Out - When the Bundy's receive a modest inheritance check from Peg's deceased uncle, they decide to splurge and eat out at an elegant restaurant.

programme.title: Quantum Leap S2 Ep07
programme.desc: Tough Shalt Not - Sam jumps into the life of a beleaguered rabbi who is desperately trying to reunite his torn family.

programme.title: Bewitched S4 Ep32
programme.desc: Man Of The Year - Endora casts a magic circle around Darrin. Everyone in range, beginning with his secretary, is charmed. Out of range; they can't understand it.

programme.desc: Splitsville - Gladys Kravitz leaves her husband and moves in with the Stephens.

programme.desc: Sweet Sixteen and Dead - Hooker sets out to stop a drug and prostitution ringleader from preying on teenage runaways.

programme.desc: With unprecedented access, Premium Rush: Inside Air Cargo Singapore goes behind-the-scenes at Changi Airfreight Centre - the nerve complex for all-things air cargo - to witness how some of the most time-sensitive and highly coveted shipments reach Singapore on time, every day.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep5
programme.desc: There's a waterfall of chocolate at a California candy factory; meet the saucy squad behind mountains of cannelloni; find out what it takes to make rice noodles by the truckload; and a hardworking team takes the hassle out of preparing butternut squash.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep6
programme.desc: From tree to bottle, follow the amazing story of maple syrup; there's a 'tower of power' behind a delectable Almond Roca butter toffee popcorn; a British Columbia candy company is giving Turkish Delight a thoroughly modern twist; and find out the secret behind apples that taste like grapes.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Atlantic S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Martin Clunes explores tropical So Tom and Prncipe, known as the African Galapagos, and encounters some fearsome predators and powerful women on the remote Bijagos Islands.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep7
programme.desc: It takes 80,000 apples to produce a single batch of fruit leather; discover the secret to making squeaky cheese curds; Hello Dolly bars are getting a vegan encore; and there's a fun-loving pit crew behind every tub of a Canadian guacamole.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep8
programme.desc: See the chocolate factory behind exotic truffles; eco-friendly coffee pods combine guilt-free caffeine with all the convenience; 250,000 gyoza dumplings roll off the assembly line every day; and meet the inventor of Moon Cheese.

programme.title: Hippo Watch with Steve Backshall S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Having been fearful of hippos since a young boy, Steve Backshall sets out to discover why hippos are considered the most dangerous animals in Africa, and if their aggressive reputation is misunderstood.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Atlantic S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Martin Clunes takes on the mountains of Madeira as a rally car navigator and patrols the waters of the Azores on the look-out for sperm whales.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S11 Ep14
programme.desc: Botswana - This episode features conservationist Aleksandra, who moved to Botswana, to live in the Kalahari desert.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S12 Ep4
programme.desc: Creatures of Darkness - Sue wonders what animal is visiting her compound at night. Ricko and his daughter spot some moose. At Calico Bluff, Denise set some rabbit traps.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Cambodia: Hidden Refuges - Bisected by the Mekong's mighty waters, Cambodia is defined by its relationship to this great river. See why the country is a biodiversity hot spot and explore the secret refuges of animal populations that survive in its untouched natural habitats.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Waterhole - Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badger's risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Coast - Go up against Australia's wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroo's deadly boxing moves and the redback spider's precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Leopard's Last Stand - A wise, old leopard reigns over the Luangwa Valley in Zambia. She holds her own against lions, but is about to face her most serious challenge - the arrival of a younger, nomadic female leopard. Witness the bitter battle of experience versus vitality.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Kings Islands/ Manawat?whi - Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cook Islands/ K?ki 'Airani - Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands' massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Great Parks Of Africa S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Hluhluwe-Imfolozi - In the heart of Zululand, South Africa, lies the oldest game reserve on the African continent - Hluhluwe-iMfolozi. Here, Southern white rhinos have found protection from people in times of turmoil. Hunted almost to extinction at the end of the 19th century, the park's establishment gave rhinos a lifeline - breeding them back from extinction.

programme.desc: Kings of Nsefu - Twin brothers with a powerful bond have ruled the Nsefu pride for three years. They're fathers to all the young, and protectors of their territory. Witness the struggle that unfolds when rival males target their territory.

programme.title: Baby Animals S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Endangered Species - Animals that were once near extinction find refuge in the safety of zoos. Celebrate the birth of red pandas, twin snow leopard cubs, a southern white rhino, and a Sulawesi macaque, all species that are endangered in the wild.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Einstein Must Go! - Get to know the Waterfront Pride: males Tom Tom and Caller, 8 lionesses, 10 youths, and Einstein, the grown cub who never left home. Watch Einstein's defiance catch up with him when rivals from the Outsiders Pride make a play that seals his fate.

programme.title: Into The Wild Colombia S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Romeo and Julieta - This is the story of Julieta, a female golden dart frog, in search of her Romeo. She's about to lay her eggs and must find a male to fertilize them. Romeo's calls guide her through the forest, but crossing the dense rainforest is no easy feat.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Rhythm of the Bay - The Hudson Bay lowlands are part of North America's largest wetland. Over 300,000 square kilometers of muskeg, a vast bogland as far as the eye can see characterized by water soaked peat, mosses and stunted trees. Once thought of as barren wasteland, it is now understood that these bogs are crucially important to life on earth. Globally, there is as much carbon dioxide held in wetlands as there is in the atmosphere.The peatland ecosystem is the most efficient carbon sink on the planet.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Cambodia: Seasonal Cycles - The Mekong is Cambodia's lifeline, especially during the scorching dry season, when precious moisture is hard to come by. Learn how all manner of flying creatures, from birds to bats, manage resources until the rainy season brings sweet relief.

programme.title: Baby Animals S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Joined at the Hip - The animal kingdom can be a harsh place, but some baby animals have a family ready to take care of their needs. Meet some of these adorable babies and their clans: a koala joey, European elk twins, a litter of Asian short-clawed otters, and black howler monkey youngsters.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Punks Strike Back - After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Macaque Island S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Clash of the Alphas - Stand back when a brawl erupts after the Street Troop finds the Hill Troop on their turf. Assess Matnoor's poor parenting skills, see alpha wannabe Ajit make his move, then cool off as a heat wave pushes everyone to share the wealth in the forest.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys who've been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Yukon Wild - The Yukon is a true wilderness, one of the last on Earth. The vast land got its name from its longest river, which the Gwich'in, one of the indigenous people of the region, call "Yu-kun- ah", or, the "great river". The third longest waterway in North America, the Yukon River flows through wide open valleys and narrow channels over 3,000 km Northwest towards the storm tossed Bering Sea.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Vietnam: Life in the Delta - The final country on the Mekong's journey is the home of the rivers mighty delta. A large deposit of rich nutrients carried downstream from hundreds of kilometres makes this region, the jewel of Vietnam's crown, a biological treasure trove.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Iced Out - Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Swords Man - Jealousy overtakes Puss when he suddenly feels like the third wheel after the Goodsword has an instant connection to El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Escape Goat - Dulcinea and the entire town must save the day after Puss attempts to rescue Uli with the help of El Guante Blanco, Golem, Goodsword and the Dutchess.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Lutheras Shield - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S2 Ep34
programme.desc: The Battle of Tianshang Part 1 - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Love Gauntlet - King Julien tries to get rid of his parents, but when evil Karl traps them in the Love Gauntlet they must prove their family's strength to survive.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S2 Ep32
programme.desc: The Jungle Games - After making a bet against Uncle King Julien, King Julien must win the "Jungle Games" in order to maintain control of the royal crown.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Dollhouse Defenders - When Gabby unboxes masks and capes for her and Pandy, they become the dollhouse defenders and must save the Gabby Cats from Bad Guy CatRat! In the Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song about her garden magic!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Mixed-Up Dollhouse - When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all cattywampus and in the wrong place. After a series of wacky misadventures that result in CatRat becoming a craft version of himself, Gabby figures out they need to fix the dollhouse globe to return everything back to normal.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 Ep47
programme.desc: The Fumbling of Football Mike - After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep16
programme.desc: The Gorgwatch Project - After Thunk and Guy tell Eep and Dawn a campfire story of Gorgwatch, a hideous monster who roams the woods, the girls are terrified. After a sleepless night, Guy and Thunk assure the girls it's just a made up story. Dawn and Eep are relieved until they find proof that Gorgwatch is real... and he's coming for them.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Skate or Dawn - When Guy invents a primitive skateboard, Eep and Dawn have a blast trying new tricks. But when the punch monkeys want to take over the girl's awesome new skate spot, Dawn and the punch monkeys enter a skate-off to win back the skate canyon once and for all.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Phil's Fun Farm - When Phil learns no one on the farm thinks he's fun, he sets out to prove them all wrong... by building a crazy amusement park.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Dragon Club - Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D'Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D'Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Featherhide - Tom and the others debate how to keep the dragons a secret, even as a rambunctious young cloaking dragon gets loose in town and pursues a friendship with a reluctant Alex.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fault Ripper - Tom and the Riders try to save ICARIS when it's revealed to be in danger from a monstrous dragon.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep68
programme.desc: Poompf! - Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tina's startup company for exploding baby Iggy's favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corp's current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep69
programme.desc: The Heat is On - On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict no-babies policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep70
programme.desc: One Tricked Pony - An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits' fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, Bridges Aflame. Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spaceship - The dollhouse delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden before Floyd (who thinks it's the best kitty toy ever!) gets his paws on it!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Gabby Gets The Hiccups - The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hamster Kitties - When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties, which convinces Mama Box to let them live in the Craft Room.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Kitty School - When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy head to different classes held by the Gabby Cats to learn and live a day in the life of a student.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Kitty Cat Cam - When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes pictures with silly filters, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse!

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Big New Mexico Pepper Hunt - When Odlulu challenges the Wanderers to win best chili (and a magic key) at the annual chili cook-off in Hatch, New Mexico, Whitebeard pulls out his old family recipe. The only problem is they don't have the most important ingredient -- a ghost pepper! They need to get a pepper and the key!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep30
programme.desc: The Case Of The Vanished Ninjas - The Ninjas are preparing for an acrobatics show. But after Pat-Pat decorates them with glitter they don't turn up for their rehearsal. Noddy investigates, looking for the Ninjas, but only finds sticky things have gone missing round Toyland - Pat-Pat's glue-stick, the Naughticorns' sticky tape, the Builders' sticky putty. Noddy works out that the glitter made the Ninjas non sticky, so they borrowed sticky things to try and make themselves sticky again. Case closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep31
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Suitcase - Pat-Pat is packing for a sleepover at the Palace when her suitcase goes missing. Noddy follows the clues and discovers that the Pockets took the suitcase in order to get Pat-Pat's sleepy pillow. They wanted to keep the pillow because it reminds them of Pat-Pat and they would miss her while she was at the sleepover. Noddy finds the Pockets and the suitcase in the dark, just in time for the sleepover. Queen Sparklewings invites everyone to the sleepover. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 Ep43
programme.desc: Big Chris' Big Jump - Big Chris has agreed to do a parachute jump for charity but loses his nerve on the big day. Can Roary talk him through it, just like Big Chris did for him when he got scared?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 Ep44
programme.desc: Brassless Bandfinal - The brass band booked for the Silver Hatch parade have cancelled. Mr Carburettor will be furious if he doesn't have music at his parade. Roary and his friends think up an ingenious plan...

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Why Crocodile Has A Bumpy Back - You see there was a time when Crocodile didn't have a bumpy back. His skin was all smooth and he had to be very careful of the hot Tinga Tinga sun. One day whilst napping Crocodile gets very sunburnt and falls into a deep sleep. Lion warns all the animals to be on their guard as the Wildebeest have returned to Tinga Tinga and they could stampede at any moment. Crocodile misses the meeting, snoring under the hot sun. The animals try to warn snappy Crocodile but it's too late and the Wildebeest stampede! OOOoof! . All over Crocodile. From that day on Crocodile has a bumpy back and is grumpier and snappier than ever! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Why Jackal Howls At The Moon - You see there was a time when Jackal didn't howl at the moon. He was a trickster and he always wanted what was not rightfully his. Jackal took over Hen's nest and Aardvark's burrow. He even took the cub's supper from Mama Cheetah! Enough was enough! All the animals decide to teach Jackal a lesson and make him believe that the Moon is made of the sweetest, most delicious honey in Tinga Tinga. Of course, Jackal instantly wants some but it never comes. From that day on Jackal howls up at the moon, waiting for another drop of delicious MOOoooon honey! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep20
programme.desc: A Knight's Tail - Huzzah! Gabby the Bold and Pandy the Purr-owd are Knights in Training, and they head into the dollhouse for the Royal Knighting Ceremony. But it turns out that someone's locked King Catnip in the tower and without him they'll have to cancel the Royal Knighting Ceremony! It's up to the Knights in Training to solve the mystery and save King Catnip by performing acts of knighthood. For our Cat of the Day, Pandy makes a shield craft!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep21
programme.desc: DJ's Glow Ride - Gabby receives a special nighttime delivery, unboxing a glow-in-the-dark train engine. However, she realizes that she's missing the other three train cars to complete the whole train. The Gabby Cats help Gabby build the other three glow-in-the-dark train cars by creating shapes through interactive/musical games. In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, DJ Catnip sings a song.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep16
programme.desc: The Gorgwatch Project - After Thunk and Guy tell Eep and Dawn a campfire story of Gorgwatch, a hideous monster who roams the woods, the girls are terrified. After a sleepless night, Guy and Thunk assure the girls it's just a made up story. Dawn and Eep are relieved until they find proof that Gorgwatch is real... and he's coming for them.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Dr. Catastrophe - During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, D'Angelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 Ep17
programme.desc: We Meat Again - After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert - but magical - chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Trolly Tales 2 , Rainbowmageddon - The Trolls try to entertain and win over Archer Pastry with a series of Troll stories/When a rainbow over Troll Village begins to experience a catastrophic breakdown, Cloud Guy arrives in the village to offer his assistance

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Game Show - It's Game Show Day in the dollhouse! Our wily and well-groomed host, CatRat, leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like Tushy Tunes on the butt xylophone couch and a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Kitty Pirates - Gabby unboxes a pirate treasure map in the shape of the dollhouse (a piece of it has been torn off). This must mean it's time for a pirate treasure hunt in the dollhouse! Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many lands of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Moms Birthday , Angry - Kelp and Scallop enlist Cruz's help to perform a dance for Mom's birthday. Though it's hard at first, they learn to put their dolphin, unicorn, and narwhal powers together to create something special. / Kelp, Pixie, Ollie, and their friend Leroy try to help Juniper understand her angry feelings.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Tuskist , Three Moon Festival - Scallop is afraid of her first tuskist appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelp's first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Tanaka's Moving Castle , Zenko Don't Go - Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Driven to Distraction , To Bee or Not To Bee - When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Sick Day - When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Bad Egg - Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Copy Cat - When Puss accidentally agrees to ride for both Artephius and the orphans in the annual San Lorenzo horse race, his twin Puss Dos enters the race.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Coin Toss - Dulcinea must save the town from thieves when Puss and the townspeople become obsessed with a gambling game and forget to protect San Lorenzo.
