The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Close Encounters Of The Mort Kind - When Mort is abducted by "aliens", King Julien teams with Clover, Maurice and Hector to investigate why he's not the one being abducted.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S2 Ep34
programme.desc: The Butterfly War - King Julien declares a war against butterflies to raise his kingdom's spirit, but when the village is destroyed he decides to hold a peace summit.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Game Show - It's Game Show Day in the dollhouse! Our wily and well-groomed host, CatRat, leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like Tushy Tunes on the butt xylophone couch and a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Kitty Pirates - Gabby unboxes a pirate treasure map in the shape of the dollhouse (a piece of it has been torn off). This must mean it's time for a pirate treasure hunt in the dollhouse! Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many lands of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep53
programme.desc: Potty Mouth - After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep54
programme.desc: Imaginary Friends - After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep55
programme.desc: Turf War - It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Joy Story - When Eep and Dawn find a stranded egg, they eagerly take it in as their new pet, but when they learn the egg is not what it seems, they have to return it before it becomes dangerous.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Big Shine - When Grug overhears Thunk accidentally call Phil "Dad", he tries to reconnect with Thunk by taking him to the natural spectacle known as "Big Shine."

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Thunder Misters - Jealous of the Thunder Sisters, the men on the farm undergo a series of difficult initiation rituals to try and join the exclusive tribe of women.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Uniconned - Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Magma Breather - Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D'Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Dragons of the Undead - When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep71
programme.desc: Federal Slumber Party - Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, he's applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Baby's cover at stake, it's up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep72
programme.desc: Floaties - A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep73
programme.desc: Breaking The Bank - Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tina's new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Joy Story - When Eep and Dawn find a stranded egg, they eagerly take it in as their new pet, but when they learn the egg is not what it seems, they have to return it before it becomes dangerous.

programme.desc: Garby's Gang - Garby has to develop confidence as a leader when he's left in charge of the Flatirons while Ty and the others are stuck far away from home.

programme.desc: He Got Game Night,73 - Turbo tries to juggle two dates at a party without being caught, White Shadow takes Skid's advice on superstitions to keep his winning streak alive.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hang Ten in Tahiti - Wally and Wenda head to Tahiti to help Wizard Wavybeard find his lost Wave Key. Odlulu sees the Wave Key as her chance to become the best surfer in Tahiti and earn a statue of herself on the beach. The Wanderers and Odlulu have a surf-off, and the winner gets the key.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Victoria Falls & Winters - When the watering hole at a Zimbabwean animal park dries up, Whitebeard sends the Wanderers to the scene with a rain-producing Weather Key, but when Odlulu gets a hold of the key, the Wanderers must pursue her through rain, fog, and snow to save those animals.

programme.desc: Hey Quacky! - Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: New Species - The team goes on a jungle expedition to find a mysterious creature. But while they race to discover a brand new species, something seems to be watching them from the treetops.

programme.desc: Potato - Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's Potato dedicating a song to his uncle Spud, who went on a spaceship to the moon.

programme.desc: Strawberry - Live from the Roots & Fruits Theatre, it's Strawberry, who used to be insecure, but now can't wait to celebrate herself and sing her song, See the Seeds!

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Undercover Tomato - Tomato paints himself green and goes undercover as a Mini Pea to discover how Evil Pea is firing them at Tato Tower. He makes an unexpected new Mini Pea friend.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Toy Aisle Trouble - Evil Pea takes all the toys in the supermarket for herself and the Cobs to play with. Supertato climbs a big wall of boxes to try and get the toys back.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep81
programme.desc: Give It Back - Tinky Winky and Dipsy both want a go with Tinky Winky's bag and start to squabble. The Noo-noo sucks up the bag and only gives it back when Tinky Winky and Dipsy are ready to share.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S5 Ep1
programme.desc: Rain - Dee encourages a friend to say 'rain' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Today's episode is all about rain!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep48
programme.desc: The Legend of the Golden Pencil - On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are learning about the seven wonders of Pop Paper City. But when they realise that one of the seven wonders has never been found, can Explorer Plom and friends find it?

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1801
programme.desc: British Invasion - Its a British invasion of the world-famous Octagon as the top stars from across the pond show off their incredible skills on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Tom Aspinall, Meatball Molly McCann, and Paddy The Baddy Pimblett.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC284MakhachevvsVolkanovski
programme.desc: At UFC 284, featherweight king Alexander Volkanovski sought a new challenge and a second belt by challenging lightweight champion Islam Makhachev. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their title bout on UFC Main Event.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS - 10 hopeful efforts, 10 absolute beauties. Lautaro Martinez, Paolo Dybala, Hakan Calhanoglu and more from wayyy out.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC312DuPlessisvsStrickland
programme.desc: UFC returns down under to Sydney, Austalia, where Middleweight champion Dricus Du Plessis defends his crown against Sean Strickland, the man he took it from, and undefeated TUF 23 winner Tatiana Suarez aims to unseat 2-time champion Zhang Weili for the Women's Strawweight title. Plus more on UFC Reloaded!

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep9
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep20
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback Ep1101
programme.desc: Gaethje vs Holloway - UFC 300 was not only a milestone event for the worlds leading MMA organization but featured a highly anticipated bout between Justin Gaethje and Max Holloway as they battled for the BMF belt and the title of the baddest fighter on the planet. See their fight like never seen before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC312DuPlessisvsStrickland
programme.desc: UFC returns down under to Sydney, Austalia, where Middleweight champion Dricus Du Plessis defends his crown against Sean Strickland, the man he took it from, and undefeated TUF 23 winner Tatiana Suarez aims to unseat 2-time champion Zhang Weili for the Women's Strawweight title. Plus more on UFC Reloaded!

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts
programme.desc: Dana White's Contender Series Alum - UFC Ultimate Knockouts delivers jaw-dropping finishes from fighters who earned their spots through Dana Whites Contender Series. See rising stars and future champions like Jack Della Maddalena, Carlos Prates, Sean OMalley, and more.

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC317TopuriavsOliveira
programme.desc: UFC 317 Countdown previews two title fights, as former 145-pound king Ilia Topuria faces former 155-pound champion Charles Oliveira for the vacant lightweight title. In the co-main event, flyweight champ Alexandre Pantoja faces Kai Kara-France.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS - 10 hopeful efforts, 10 absolute beauties. Lautaro Martinez, Paolo Dybala, Hakan Calhanoglu and more from wayyy out.

programme.title: UFC 321: Aspinall vs. Gane
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC heavyweight world championship will be on the line on October 25 at Etihad Arena in Abu Dhabi when Tom Aspinall defends his undisputed crown for the first time against Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 321. Englands Aspinall has ended his last three wins by knockout, including an interim title-winning effort over Sergei Pavlovich and a successful defense against Curtis Blaydes. This fall, he will face another stern test in French star Gane, a former interim champ looking to add undisputed goal to his trophy case after back-to-back wins over Serghei Spivac and Alexander Volkov

programme.title: Game Changer
programme.desc: Ram Nandan, a government official, embarks on a relentless fight against corrupt politicians. Determined to bring about fair elections, he tries to revolutionise the way the government operates.

programme.title: Yeh Saali Aashiqui
programme.desc: A supposedly deranged man is arrested on suspicion of breaking into his exlover's home. But when he starts talking, he appears to be far more intelligent and twisted than anyone could have predicted.

programme.title: Awarapan
programme.desc: Shivam, a hitman, is asked to keep an eye on his boss's mistress. However, he soon learns that she has been a victim of sex trafficking and decides to unite her with her lover.

programme.title: Tutak Tutak Tutiya
programme.desc: Krishna Prabhu Deva, a city bachelor, wishes to get married to a modern, English speaking girl but ends up with village belle Devi Tamannaah. 2016

programme.desc: A corrupt police officer, works for Durva, an influential smuggler. However, his life takes an unusual turn when he decides to avenge a woman who was assaulted by Durva's brothers.

programme.desc: While trying to catch a smart thief, an undercover agent and his partner realise that the case is linked to the murder of a crime lord. 2019

programme.desc: Shivam, a hitman, is asked to keep an eye on his boss's mistress. However, he soon learns that she has been a victim of sex trafficking and decides to unite her with her lover.

programme.title: Tutak Tutak Tutiya
programme.desc: Krishna Prabhu Deva, a city bachelor, wishes to get married to a modern, English speaking girl but ends up with village belle Devi Tamannaah. 2016

programme.title: Jaat
programme.desc: In a remote coastal village, criminal Varadaraja Ranatunga terrorises the locals. A travelling stranger's encounter with his men uncovers the villagers' suffering.

programme.title: Ujda Chaman
programme.desc: A balding 30yearold bachelor in search of a beautiful wife is given a deadline to find one or remain celibate forever.

programme.title: Judaa Hoke Bhi
programme.desc: A married couple struggling with an unimaginable loss are further torn apart when they are lured under false pretences to Uttarakhand separately.

programme.title: Commando 3
programme.desc: The commando, Karanveer Singh Dogra, is approached to chase and catch an Indian criminal gang, who pose a threat to India itself.

programme.title: Cirkus
programme.desc: Chaos reigns due to a case of mistaken identity when two sets of twins who were separated at birth coincidentally visit the same city.

programme.title: Entertainment
